languages.text: На имперских кораблях обычно установлены пустотные щиты — энергетические поля, поглощающие наносимый кораблю урон. За каждую единицу поглощенного урона щит теряет единицу своего заряда. Пустотный щит делится на 4 сектора, распределенных по сторонам корабля. Каждый сектор независим от других, и если заряд одного сектора исчерпан, он не может больше поглощать урон, даже если все остальные секторы щита целы.

Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}shield sector{/g} will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.
languages.original_text: На имперских кораблях обычно установлены пустотные щиты — энергетические поля, поглощающие наносимый кораблю урон. За каждую единицу поглощенного урона щит теряет единицу своего заряда. Пустотный щит делится на 4 сектора, распределенных по сторонам корабля. Каждый сектор независим от других, и если заряд одного сектора исчерпан, он не может больше поглощать урон, даже если все остальные секторы щита целы.

traits.locale_text: Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that shield sector will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.

Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that shield sector will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.

Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that shield sector will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.

Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}shield sector{/g} will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.

Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}shield sector{/g} will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.

languages.text: Die meisten Schiffe im Imperium nutzen Raumschilde – Energiefelder, die das Schiff vor feindlichem Beschuss bewahren. Für jeden von einem Schild absorbierten Schadenspunkt verliert er eine seiner Ladungen. Dein Raumschild besitzt 4 an den Seiten des Schiffes verteilte Sektoren. Jeder Sektor hat seine eigene unabhängige Ladung und wenn einer von ihnen verbraucht ist, ist dieser {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}Schildsektor{/g} nicht mehr in der Lage, Schaden zu absorbieren, auch wenn die restlichen Schilde noch intakt sind.
languages.original_text: Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}shield sector{/g} will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.

traits.locale_text: Die meisten Schiffe im Imperium nutzen Raumschilde — Energiefelder, die das Schiff vor feindlichem Beschuss bewahren. Für jeden von einem Schild absorbierten Schadenspunkt verliert er eine seiner Ladungen. Dein Raumschild besitzt 4 an den Seiten des Schiffes verteilte Sektoren. Jeder Sektor hat seine eigene unabhängige Ladung und wenn einer von ihnen verbraucht ist, ist dieser {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}Schildsektor{/g} nicht mehr in der Lage, Schaden zu absorbieren, auch wenn die restlichen Schilde noch intakt sind.

languages.text: La plupart des vaisseaux de l'Imperium utilisent des boucliers, des champs d'énergie protégeant les vaisseaux des tirs ennemis. Chaque fois qu'un bouclier absorbe un point de dégâts, il perd un point de charge. Votre bouclier est composé de 4 secteurs répartis sur les flancs du vaisseau. Chaque secteur dispose d'une charge indépendante et en cas d'épuisement, le {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}secteur{/g} en question ne pourra plus absorber de dégâts, même si les autres boucliers sont intacts.
languages.original_text: Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}shield sector{/g} will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.

traits.locale_text: La plupart des vaisseaux de l'Imperium utilisent des boucliers, des champs d'énergie capables de protéger les vaisseaux des tirs ennemis. Chaque fois qu'un bouclier absorbe un point de dégâts, il perd un point de charge. Votre bouclier est composé de 4 secteurs répartis sur les flancs du vaisseau. Chaque secteur dispose d'une charge indépendante et en cas d'épuisement, le {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}secteur{/g} en question ne pourra plus absorber de dégâts, même si les autres boucliers sont intacts.

languages.text: 绝大多数帝国舰船都会使用虚空护盾来进行防护，这种能量场会保护舰船免受敌方火力攻击。护盾每吸收1点伤害，就会损失1点能量。您的虚空护盾共有4个区域，分布在飞船两侧。每个区域的能量都是各自独立的。如果其中某片区域的护盾耗尽，则即便其他区域的护盾完好无损，耗尽的{g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}护盾区域{/g}也无法继续吸收伤害。
languages.original_text: Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}shield sector{/g} will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.

traits.locale_text: 绝大多数帝国舰船都会使用虚空护盾来进行防护，这种能量场会保护舰船免受敌方火力攻击。护盾每吸收1点伤害，就会损失1点能量。您的虚空护盾共有4个区域，分布在飞船两侧。每个区域的能量都是各自独立的。如果其中某片区域的护盾耗尽，则即便其他区域的护盾完好无损，耗尽的{g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}护盾区域{/g}也无法继续吸收伤害。

languages.text: ほとんどの帝国の船がヴォイドシールドという敵の攻撃から船を保護するエネルギーフィールドを使用している。シールドが吸収したダメージポイントごとに、チャージ1ポイントを失う。ヴォイドシールドには船の側面に位置する4つのセクターがある。各セクターのチャージは独立しており、そのうちの1つを使い果たすと、シールドのその他の部分が無傷であっても、その{g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}シールドセクター{/g}はダメージを吸収できなくなる。
languages.original_text: Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}shield sector{/g} will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.

traits.locale_text: ほとんどの帝国の船がヴォイドシールドという敵の攻撃から船を保護するエネルギーフィールドを使用している。シールドが吸収したダメージポイントごとに、チャージを1ポイント失う。ヴォイドシールドには船の側面に位置する4つのセクターがある。各セクターのチャージは独立しており、そのうちの1つを使い果たすと、シールドのその他の部分が無傷であっても、その{g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}シールドセクター{/g}はダメージを吸収できなくなる。

languages.text: La mayoría de las naves del Imperium hacen uso de escudos de vacío; es decir, campos de energía que protegen del fuego enemigo. Por cada punto de daño que absorba el escudo, perderá un punto de carga. Tu escudo de vacío tiene 4 sectores distribuidos por los flancos de la nave. Cada sector tiene su propia carga independiente. Si algún {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}sector de escudo{/g} se queda sin carga, dejará de absorber daño aunque los demás se encuentren intactos.
languages.original_text: Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}shield sector{/g} will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.

traits.locale_text: La mayoría de las naves del Imperium hacen uso de escudos de vacío; es decir, campos de energía que protegen del fuego enemigo. Por cada punto de daño que absorba el escudo, perderá un punto de carga. Tu escudo de vacío tiene 4 sectores distribuidos por los flancos de la nave. Cada sector tiene su propia carga independiente. Si algún {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}sector de escudo{/g} se queda sin carga, dejará de absorber daño aunque los demás se encuentren intactos.

languages.text: İmparatorluk'taki çoğu gemi, kendisini düşman ateşinden koruyan enerji alanları olan uçsuz kalkanlarından yararlanır. Kalkan, emdiği her hasar puanı karşılığında gücünün bir puanını yitirir. Uçsuz kalkanında, geminin kenarları boyunca dağıtılmış 4 sektör bulunur. Her sektörün kendi bağımsız gücü vardır ve içlerinden biri tükenecek olursa o {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}kalkan sektörü{/g}, diğer kalkanlar sağlam da olsa artık hasar ememez.
languages.original_text: Most ships in the Imperium utilise void shields — energy fields that protect the vessel from enemy fire. For every point of damage absorbed by a shield, it loses one point of its charge. Your void shield has 4 sectors distributed along the sides of the ship. Each sector has its own independent charge, and if one of them is depleted, that {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}shield sector{/g} will no longer be able to absorb damage even if the rest of the shields are intact.
